Sql.CDATA:
/****** Object: View [dbo].[ASCICTranView] Script Date: 5/14/2019 1:06:17 AM ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[ASCICTranView]')) DROP VIEW [ASCICTranView] GO /****** Object: View [dbo].[ASCICTranView] Script Date: 5/14/2019 1:06:17 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[ASCICTranView]')) EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'
CREATE VIEW [ASCICTranView] as
SELECT top 100 PERCENT COALESCE(T.CompanyID, P.CompanyID) CompanyID ,CONVERT(INT, COALESCE(T.ICTranID, (SELECT IDENT_CURRENT (''ASCICTran'')) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY P.CreatedDateTime, SortOrder ASC) - 1)) ICTranID ,COALESCE(T.SourceSiteID, P.SourceSiteID) SourceSiteID ,COALESCE(T.SourceObject, P.SourceObject) SourceObject ,COALESCE(T.SourceType, P.SourceType) SourceType ,COALESCE(T.SourceRef, P.SourceRef) SourceRef ,COALESCE(T.DestinationSiteID, P.DestinationSiteID) DestinationSiteID ,COALESCE(T.DestinationObject, P.DestinationObject) DestinationObject ,COALESCE(T.DestinationType, P.DestinationType) DestinationType ,COALESCE(T.RemoteAcctCD, P.RemoteAcctCD) RemoteAcctCD ,COALESCE(T.DestinationRef, P.DestinationRef) DestinationRef ,CONVERT(BIT, COALESCE(T.Complete, P.Complete) ) Complete ,COALESCE(T.FailedAttempts, P.FailedAttempts) FailedAttempts ,COALESCE(T.CompletedDateTime, P.CompletedDateTime) CompletedDateTime ,COALESCE(T.tstamp, P.tstamp) tstamp ,COALESCE(T.CreatedByID, P.CreatedByID) CreatedByID ,COALESCE(T.CreatedByScreenID, P.CreatedByScreenID) CreatedByScreenID ,COALESCE(T.CreatedDateTime, P.CreatedDateTime) CreatedDateTime ,COALESCE(T.LastModifiedByID, P.LastModifiedByID) LastModifiedByID ,COALESCE(T.LastModifiedByScreenID, P.LastModifiedByScreenID) LastModifiedByScreenID ,COALESCE(T.LastModifiedDateTime, P.LastModifiedDateTime) LastModifiedDateTime FROM (
SELECT top 100 percent OBJ.CompanyID , NULL as ICTranID , ICSortOrder SortOrder , Setting.SourceSiteID , ''POOrder'' as SourceObject , OBJ.OrderType as SourceType , OrderNbr as SourceRef , DestinationSiteID , DestinationObject , DestinationType , RemoteAcctCD , '''' as DestinationRef , 0 as Complete , 0 as FailedAttempts , ''1900-01-01 00:00:00.000'' CompletedDateTime , OBJ.tstamp , OBJ.CreatedByID , OBJ.CreatedByScreenID , OBJ.CreatedDateTime , OBJ.LastModifiedByID , OBJ.LastModifiedByScreenID , OBJ.LastModifiedDateTime FROM ASCICSiteBAccountSettings Setting INNER JOIN ASCICSiteBAccount Acct on Setting.CompanyID = Acct.CompanyID and Setting.BAccountID = Acct.BAccountID INNER JOIN POOrder OBJ on Setting.CompanyID = OBJ.CompanyID and Setting.BAccountID = OBJ.VendorID and OBJ.OrderType = Setting.SourceType AND Setting.SourceObject = ''POOrder'' and OBJ.Status = ''N'' WHERE Len(COALESCE(VendorRefNbr,'''')) = 0 ORDER BY Setting.ICSortOrder UNION ALL SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT OBJ.CompanyID , NULL as ICTranID , ICSortOrder SortOrder , Setting.SourceSiteID , ''SOShipment'' as SourceObject , ''Issue'' as SourceType , ShipmentNbr as SourceRef , Setting.DestinationSiteID , DestinationObject , DestinationType , RemoteAcctCD , '''' as DestinationRef , 0 as Complete , 0 as FailedAttempts , ''1900-01-01 00:00:00.000'' CompletedDateTime , OBJ.tstamp , OBJ.CreatedByID , OBJ.CreatedByScreenID , OBJ.CreatedDateTime , OBJ.LastModifiedByID , OBJ.LastModifiedByScreenID , OBJ.LastModifiedDateTime FROM ASCICSiteBAccountSettings Setting INNER JOIN ASCICSiteBAccount Acct on Setting.CompanyID = Acct.CompanyID and Setting.BAccountID = Acct.BAccountID INNER JOIN SOShipment OBJ on Setting.CompanyID = OBJ.CompanyID and Setting.BAccountID = OBJ.CustomerID and Setting.SourceObject = ''SOShipment'' and OBJ.Status = ''F'' and OBJ.Confirmed = 1 ORDER BY Setting.ICSortOrder ) P LEFT JOIN ASCICTran T on P.CompanyID = T.CompanyID AND P.SourceSiteID = T.SourceSiteID AND P.SourceObject = T.SourceObject AND P.SourceType = T.SourceType AND P.SourceRef = T.SourceRef AND P.DestinationSiteID = T.DestinationSiteID AND P.DestinationObject = T.DestinationObject AND P.DestinationType = T.DestinationType --AND P.DestinationRef = T.DestinationRef WHERE COALESCE(T.Complete, P.Complete) = 0 AND COALESCE(T.FailedAttempts, P.FailedAttempts) <=3 ORDER BY CreatedDateTime, SortOrder ' GO
